posts.post_content:
Quang, that's not what he meant.   
This doesn't lower the cost of Wooly Thoctar because it costs WGR, and Urza's Filter lowers only the colorless portion of the mana cost.   
  
Example: something that cost 4WGR would only cost 2WGR instead .   
  
Derp

posts.post_content:
Erm, rubber you're wrong.  
  
Multicolored: Cards that require mana from two or more different colors  
  
It's not restricted to cards that are two-colour hybrid (black/white, green/white, etc)
posts.html:
Erm, rubber you're wrong.

Multicolored: Cards that require mana from two or more different colors

It's not restricted to cards that are two-colour hybrid (black/white, green/white, etc)

posts.post_content:
This is better than [Sisay's Ring](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sisay's Ring) because you don't have to tap it to use it, therefore do not need [Voltaic Key](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Voltaic Key), etc so instead it's free to use with [Mana Vault](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mana Vault) or whatever awesomeness and it's stackable with [Urza's Incubator](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Urza's Incubator) (set on Golem or Construct for [Lodestone Golem](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lodestone Golem), [Karn, Silver Golem](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Karn, Silver Golem), [Metalworker](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Metalworker), or [Darksteel Colossus](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Darksteel Colossus)), [Vedalken Engineer](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vedalken Engineer) or [Etherium Sculptor](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Etherium Sculptor). Besides, if you were considering Sisay's Ring...maybe [Sol Ring](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sol Ring) or [Thran Dynamo](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Thran Dynamo) would be better...  
  
**Think About This:** *Double with a [Vesuvan Doppelganger](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vesuvan Doppelganger) or whatever a [Painter's Servant](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Painter's Servant) makes CMC 2 artifacts become free, like \*bam\*, [Myr Superion](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Myr Superion).* I know, I know, you say all of those effects help ever... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)

Besides, if you were considering Sisay's Ring...maybe Sol Ring or Thran Dynamo would be better...
